@xml:id="CHOB_19240506 [Letter from Carolie Hobson to Leonard Woolf, 06 04 1924]: a machine readable transcription A letter from Carolie Hobson to Leonard woolf, providing a list of people who should be provided with a notice Letter from Coralie Hobson to Leonard Woolf, 6 April 1924.
Carolie Hobson Creation of machine-readable version: Julia Blomberg
Conversion to TEI-conformant markup: Julia Blomberg Editorial annotations: Julia Blomberg
unknown 6 April 1924
Leonard Woolf
mon 6 5 24
DearMr Woolf
The following are the
name and addresses of a few
people to whom I think you
might send notices.
Mr Arthur Rowntree
Bootham school
York
W.S. Rowntree esq.
Scarborough
York
T.C. Christianson
c/o Metropolitan Vickers
Electrical co. ltd
Trafford Park
Manchester
R. Helson
32 Victoria st
s.w.l
Mrs Blanche Smith
c/o Manchester guardian
Cross st
Manchester
M.A. Spielman
29 Cambridge sq
Lo 2.
Yours Sincerely,
Coralie Hobson
